translation.en: [Hiccup] This is Berk,
translation.zh: 这是博克岛

translation.en: the best-kept secret this side of, well, anywhere.
translation.zh: 一个神秘的小岛

translation.en: Granted, it may not look like much, but this wet heap of rock
translation.zh: 它看上去很不起眼 不过湿漉漉的岩石中藏着很多的惊喜

translation.en: packs more than a few surprises.
translation.zh: 不过湿漉漉的岩石中藏着很多的惊喜

translation.en: Life here is amazing, just not for the faint of heart.
translation.zh: 这里的生活很精彩 心脏不好可承受不了

translation.en: You see, where most folks enjoy hobbies
translation.zh: 别的地方的人们业余爱好是

translation.en: like whittling or needlepoint,
translation.zh: 削削木头或者绣绣花

translation.en: we Berkians prefer
translation.zh: 可我们博克岛人喜欢的

translation.en: a little something we like to call
translation.zh: 是更刺激的事 我们叫它

translation.en: dragon racing!
translation.zh: 飞龙大赛

translation.en: I'm sorry, Fishlegs. Did you want that?
translation.zh: 抱歉了 鱼脚司 想要这个吗？

translation.en: [Fishlegs] Snotlout, that was mine!
translation.zh: 鼻涕虫 那是我的

translation.en: Here you go, babe.
translation.zh: 接着 宝贝

translation.en: Did I tell you that you look amazing today, because you do.
translation.zh: 你今天看起来可真迷人

translation.en: Ugh. Come on, Barf. It's starting to stink around here.
translation.zh: 我们走 巴夫 这儿已经越来越臭了

translation.en: Nope. Still hates you. Let's blow this place, Belch!
translation.zh: 又拍马蹄上了 我们去打败他们 贝尔奇

translation.en: [Tuffnut] All right!
translation.zh: 搞定

translation.en: [Tuffnut laughs] Oh, yeah!
translation.zh: 好样的

translation.en: Ha-ha! That's nine for the Twins,
translation.zh: 双胞胎得九分

translation.en: Astrid lags with three.
translation.zh: 阿丝翠德得三分

translation.en: Fishlegs and Snotlout trail with none.
translation.zh: 鱼脚司和鼻涕虫零分垫底

translation.en: And Hiccup is…
translation.zh: 小嗝嗝

translation.en: Nowhere to be found. Hmm.
translation.zh: 影儿都没见着

translation.en: Scared him off with the big talk, didn't you, Stoick?
translation.zh: 你的促膝长谈吓得他不敢来了 是不是 斯多戈？

translation.en: What are you doing, Snotlout? They're gonna win now.
translation.zh: 你在干什么 鼻涕虫？他们就要赢了

translation.en: She's my princess. Whatever she wants, she gets.
translation.zh: 她是我的公主 她要什么我都给

translation.en: [Astrid] Ruffnut? Didn't she try to bury you alive?
translation.zh: 拉芙纳特 她上次不是要活埋了你吗？

translation.en: [Snotlout] Only for a few hours.
translation.zh: 也就埋了几个小时

translation.en: [Hiccup] Now, dragons used to be a bit of a problem here,
translation.zh: 龙在这里的确制造过不愉快 但那是五年前的事了

translation.en: but that was five years ago.
translation.zh: 但那是五年前的事了

translation.en: Now, they have all moved in.
translation.zh: 现在它们融入了我们

translation.en: And really, why wouldn't they?
translation.zh: 说真的 为什么不呢？

translation.en: We have custom stables,
translation.zh: 这里有定制的宿舍

translation.en: all-you-can-eat feeding stations,
translation.zh: 可以大快朵颐的自助餐

translation.en: a full-service dragon wash,
translation.zh: 一条龙洗浴中心

translation.en: even top-of-the-line fire prevention if I do say so myself.
translation.zh: 甚至还有顶级的消防设备 当然这只是我的想法

translation.en: [chuckles] It's time, Gobber. Righty-ho. Last lap!
translation.zh: -到时间了 高博 -好的 最后一圈

translation.en: The Black Sheep! Come on, Stormfly.
translation.zh: 是黑绵羊 快点 风里飞

translation.en: We can still win this thing!
translation.zh: 我们还有机会赢

translation.en: -[Ruffnut] Come on, Barf! -[Tuffnut] Let's go!
translation.zh: -快点 巴夫 -我们走

translation.en: Go, Meatlug!
translation.zh: 快啊 肉耳朵

translation.en: [Fishlegs] Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: This is your big moment. Have a nice flight!
translation.zh: 轮到你上场了 祝你飞行愉快

translation.en: Up, up, up!
translation.zh: 往上呀 往上

translation.en: -[Astrid] No! -[Fishlegs] Yes!
translation.zh: 不 太好了

translation.en: Good job, Meatlug.
translation.zh: 干得漂亮 肉耳朵

translation.en: Here you go, darling. Mine is worth ten.
translation.zh: 快接着 亲爱的 这只顶十分

translation.en: Yeah! The Black Sheep!
translation.zh: 好极了 是黑绵羊

translation.en: [Astrid] You guys are fighting for Ruffnut?
translation.zh: 你们俩跟拉芙纳特是一伙的？

translation.en: I'm totally winning!
translation.zh: 这回我赢定了

translation.en: We're winning together! [screams]
translation.zh: 是我们一起赢

translation.en: [Snotlout] Oh, no!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Whoo! No one can stop me now!
translation.zh: 现在没人能够阻挡我了

translation.en: Except for me. We're attached, genius.
translation.zh: 除了我之外 我们可是连在一起的

translation.en: -Quit trying to steal all my glory! -Hey!
translation.zh: 你别想抢了我的风头

translation.en: Get them, Astrid!
translation.zh: 加油 阿丝翠德

translation.en: -[Tuffnut] It's my glory! -[Ruffnut] Always ruining everything!
translation.zh: -这荣誉属于我 -你总是把一切搞砸

translation.en: -[Tuffnut] No sheep, no glory! -[Astrid] Gotcha! [laughs]
translation.zh: -没有绵羊 就没有荣誉 -抓到了

translation.en: -Whoa! -Astrid! Well played! [laughs]
translation.zh: -阿丝翠德 -干得漂亮

translation.en: -That's my future daughter-in-law! -[grunts]
translation.zh: 那可是我未来的儿媳妇

translation.en: -Excuse me. -Stormfly!
translation.zh: -对不起了 -风里飞

translation.en: That's 13! Astrid takes the game!
translation.zh: 是13分 阿丝翠德赢了

translation.en: [Hiccup] Yep, Berk is pretty much perfect.
translation.zh: 没错 博克岛可以说很完美

translation.en: All of my hard work has paid off.
translation.zh: 我所有的努力都得到了回报

translation.en: And it's a good thing, too, because with Vikings on the backs of dragons…
translation.zh: 而且这也是件好事 因为维京人有了龙这个好伙伴

translation.en: -[Astrid] Whoo-hoo! -[exclaims in shock]
translation.zh: 因为维京人有了龙这个好伙伴 世界变得更加有趣 不再遥不可及

translation.en: …the world just got a whole lot bigger.
translation.zh: 世界变得更加有趣 不再遥不可及

translation.en: So what do you think, bud?
translation.zh: 觉得怎么样 伙计？

translation.en: You wanna give this another shot?
translation.zh: 你想不想再来一次？

translation.en: Toothless! It will be fine.
translation.zh: 没牙仔 不会有事的

translation.en: Ready?
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 好耶

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 棒

translation.en: This is amazing! No longer amazing!
translation.zh: 简直太爽了 爽过头了

translation.en: Toothless!
translation.zh: 没牙仔

translation.en: Oh, no!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: That really came out of nowhere.
translation.zh: 还真有点措手不及

translation.en: We got to work on your solo gliding there, bud.
translation.zh: 伙计 你的单独滑行还有待提高

translation.en: That locked-up tail
translation.zh: 那个固定尾翼

translation.en: makes for some pretty sloppy rescue maneuvers, hey?
translation.zh: 不方便进行救援行动 是吧？

translation.en: Looks like we found another one, bud.
translation.zh: 我们好像发现了新大陆 伙计

translation.en: Oh, what, do you want an apology?
translation.zh: 怎么？你是想让我道歉吗？

translation.en: Is that why you're pouting, big baby boo?
translation.zh: 不会这么小心眼吧 我的大宝贝？

translation.en: Well, try this on! [grunts]
translation.zh: 那就来尝尝这个吧

translation.en: Oh, you feeling it yet? Huh?
translation.zh: 感觉到了吗？

translation.en: Picking up on all of my heartfelt remorse? [grunting]
translation.zh: 感觉到我诚挚的歉意了吗？

translation.en: Oh, come on, come on. You wouldn't hurt a one-legged… [screams]
translation.zh: 好了 别这样 你不会欺负我这个残疾…

translation.en: You're right! You're right! You win. You win.
translation.zh: 你是对的 你赢了

translation.en: He's down. And it's ugly.
translation.zh: 他倒下了 太不幸了

translation.en: Dragons and Vikings, enemies again,
translation.zh: 龙族和维京人 我们又成了死对头

translation.en: locked in combat to the bitter… Oh!
translation.zh: 战斗越来越激烈

translation.en: You know that doesn't wash out.
translation.zh: 别这样 你知道这东西很难洗的

translation.en: So, what should we name it?
translation.zh: 那么 怎么命名？

translation.en: "Itchy Armpit" it is.
translation.zh: 那就叫“咯吱湾”吧

translation.en: What do you reckon, bud?
translation.zh: 觉得怎么样 伙计？

translation.en: Think we might find a few Timberjacks in those woods?
translation.zh: 说不定我们能在森林里 发现几只伐木龙

translation.en: The odd Whispering Death or two in the rocks?
translation.zh: 或者在石头缝里找到两只咻咻龙

translation.en: Who knows? Maybe we'll finally track down another Night Fury.
translation.zh: 谁知道呢？ 也许我们还能再找到一只夜煞

translation.en: Wouldn't that be something?
translation.zh: 那就太酷了对吗？

translation.en: [sighs] So, what do you say? Just keep going?
translation.zh: 你觉得还要继续吗？

translation.en: Afternoon, milady. Where have you been?
translation.zh: 下午好 女士 你去哪了？

translation.en: Oh, winning races, what else?
translation.zh: 去赢比赛 还能去哪？

translation.en: The real question is, where have you been?
translation.zh: 应该是我来问你 你去哪了？

translation.en: Avoiding my dad.
translation.zh: 躲我爸爸

translation.en: Oh, no. What happened now?
translation.zh: 不是吧 又怎么了？

translation.en: Oh, you're gonna love this.
translation.zh: 你肯定爱听这个

translation.en: I wake up. The sun is shining.
translation.zh: 我早晨起来 外面阳光灿烂

translation.en: Terrible Terrors are singing on the rooftop.
translation.zh: 恐怖龙正在屋顶放声歌唱

translation.en: I saunter down to breakfast
translation.zh: 我下来吃早餐 感觉这世界一切正常

translation.en: thinking all is right with the world and I get,
translation.zh: 我下来吃早餐 感觉这世界一切正常 这时候就听 儿子 我得跟你谈谈

translation.en: [imitating Stoick] "Son, we need to talk."
translation.zh: 这时候就听 儿子 我得跟你谈谈

translation.en: [imitating Hiccup] "Not now, Dad. I got a whole day
translation.zh: 我没空 爸爸 我一整天有好多事情要做

translation.en: "of goofing off to get started." [snickers]
translation.zh: 我一整天有好多事情要做

translation.en: Okay, first of all, I don't sound like that.
translation.zh: 行了吧你 首先 我说话不是那样的

translation.en: Who is this character?
translation.zh: 你这是在学谁呢？

translation.en: And second, what is that thing you're doing with my shoulders?
translation.zh: 其次 我说话时才不会耸肩膀呢

translation.en: Yeah, that's a truly flattering impersonation.
translation.zh: 你的表演有点太过了

translation.en: Anyway, he goes,
translation.zh: 然后呢 他说

translation.en: [imitating Stoick] "You're the pride of Berk, son, and I couldn't be prouder."
translation.zh: 你是博克岛的骄傲 儿子 我感到非常自豪

translation.en: [imitating Hiccup] "Aw, thanks, Dad." "I'm pretty impressed with myself, too."
translation.zh: 谢谢了 老爸 我也为自己感到自豪

translation.en: [laughing] When have I ever done that with my hands?
translation.zh: 我的手什么时候那样过？

translation.en: You just did.
translation.zh: 刚才就是那样

translation.en: Okay. Just hold still.
translation.zh: 好吧 你别动

translation.en: -[chuckles] -This is very serious.
translation.zh: 这很严肃

translation.en: [imitating Stoick] "You're all grown up,
translation.zh: 你已经长大了

translation.en: "and since no chief could ask for a better successor,
translation.zh: 由你来做接班人再合适不过了

translation.en: "I've decided…" To make you chief!
translation.zh: -所以我决定… -让你做头领

translation.en: Oh, my gods! Hiccup, that's amazing!
translation.zh: 天哪 小嗝嗝 真是太棒了

translation.en: You're gonna wear out the spring coil.
translation.zh: 可别把我的弹簧弄坏了

translation.en: The calibration is very sensitive.
translation.zh: 这装置的灵敏度很高的

translation.en: Yeah, so… this is what I'm dealing with.
translation.zh: 所以 这就是我现在面临的问题

translation.en: What did you tell him?
translation.zh: -那你是怎么说的？ -什么也没说

translation.en: I didn't. By the time he turned around, I was gone.
translation.zh: -那你是怎么说的？ -什么也没说 趁他转身的时候 我撒腿就跑了

translation.en: Huh, well, it's a lot of responsibility.
translation.zh: 好吧 这是很重的担子

translation.en: The map will have to wait for sure,
translation.zh: 地图的事要暂时搁置一下 以后没牙仔就由我来训练

translation.en: and I'll need to fly Toothless,
translation.zh: 以后没牙仔就由我来训练

translation.en: since you'll be too busy, but…
translation.zh: 因为你肯定会很忙 但是…

translation.en: It's not me, Astrid.
translation.zh: 我可干不了 阿丝翠德

translation.en: All those speeches and planning,
translation.zh: 那些演讲、规划 还有管理村庄

translation.en: and running the village, that's his thing.
translation.zh: 那些演讲、规划 还有管理村庄 都是他擅长的

translation.en: I think you're missing the point.
translation.zh: 我觉得你忽略了重点

translation.en: I mean, "chief." What an honor.
translation.zh: 我是说 头领 多大的荣誉啊

translation.en: -I'd be pretty excited. -I… [sighs]
translation.zh: 换作是我肯定激动死了 可是我和你不一样

translation.en: I'm not like you.
translation.zh: 可是我和你不一样

translation.en: You know exactly who you are. You always have.
translation.zh: 你一直都清楚地知道自己是谁

translation.en: But I'm still looking.
translation.zh: 可我还在寻找

translation.en: I know that I'm not my father,
translation.zh: 我知道我不可能像我爸爸那样

translation.en: and I never met my mother,
translation.zh: 我从没见过我妈妈 所以…

translation.en: so what does that make me?
translation.zh: 我到底是谁呢？

translation.en: What you're searching for isn't out there, Hiccup.
translation.zh: 你想找的答案并不在那儿 小嗝嗝

translation.en: It's in here.
translation.zh: 而是在这里

translation.en: Maybe you just don't see it yet.
translation.zh: 也许你只是还没发现它

translation.en: -Ugh. Ugh! -Maybe. But you know,
translation.zh: 也许吧 但你知道

translation.en: there is something out there. Hiccup… [gasps]
translation.zh: -那儿确实有什么东西 -小嗝嗝

translation.en: Stay close.
translation.zh: 跟紧点

translation.en: What happened here?
translation.zh: 这里发生了什么？

translation.en: All right, easy, bud.
translation.zh: 别这么紧张 伙计

translation.en: [gasps] Hiccup!
translation.zh: 小嗝嗝

translation.en: [man] Fire! Astrid, look out!
translation.zh: -开火 -阿丝翠德 当心

translation.en: Hiccup!
translation.zh: 小嗝嗝

translation.en: Watch the tail! [grunts]
translation.zh: 小心尾巴

translation.en: Tie those legs up!
translation.zh: 捆住腿

translation.en: Is that what I think it is?
translation.zh: 我不是眼睛花了吧？

translation.en: [Hiccup] Stop!
translation.zh: -住手 -风里飞

translation.en: [Astrid] Stormfly!
translation.zh: -住手 -风里飞 小心

translation.en: What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你们在干什么？

translation.en: Back again?
translation.zh: 回来了

translation.en: Soil my britches. That is a Night Fury.
translation.zh: 太让人惊讶了 真的是一只夜煞

translation.en: I thought they were all gone for good.
translation.zh: 还以为它们早都死光了

translation.en: It looks like our luck's had a turn for the better, lads.
translation.zh: 我们今天的运气真不错 伙计们

translation.en: Don't think Drago has one of those
translation.zh: 看来德雷格的龙族军队里

translation.en: in his dragon army. Dragon army?
translation.zh: -又有一名新战士了 -龙族军队？

translation.en: Look, we don't want any trouble.
translation.zh: 听着 我们不想找麻烦

translation.en: You should have thought of that
translation.zh: 你偷了我们的龙

translation.en: before you stole all of our dragons,
translation.zh: 毁掉我们村庄的时候

translation.en: and blasted our fort to bits!
translation.zh: 就该想到这点 -没错 -就是 装模作样

translation.en: What are you talking about?
translation.zh: -等等 -你这话是什么意思？

translation.en: You think we did this?
translation.zh: 你认为那是我们干的？

translation.en: [scoffs] Dragon trapping is hard enough work
translation.zh: 捕龙这事已经很难了

translation.en: as it is without do-gooder dragon riders
translation.zh: 捕龙这事已经很难了 何况还遇上了好心的龙骑士

translation.en: sneaking in to rescue them.
translation.zh: 前来捣乱救龙

translation.en: What do-gooder?
translation.zh: 好心的龙骑士？

translation.en: There are other dragon riders?
translation.zh: 难道还有别的龙骑士？

translation.en: You mean other than your thieving friend from last night? You tell me.
translation.zh: 你是说 除了你那个 昨晚来偷龙的朋友吗？ 你来告诉我

translation.en: You may have an ice-spitting dragon on your side,
translation.zh: 你们也许有一只厉害的喷冰龙

translation.en: but we still have a quota to fill.
translation.zh: 但我们必须再补上一只

translation.en: How do you suppose we explain this mess to Drago Bludvist?
translation.zh: 不然我们没法 向德雷格布拉德维斯特交代

translation.en: Drago what-fist? Does anything you say make sense?
translation.zh: 德雷格什么？喂死它？ 你在说什么乱七八糟的？

translation.en: He's expecting a new shipment of dragons for his army by tomorrow.
translation.zh: 他给他的龙族军队订了一批新龙 要明天送到

translation.en: And Drago don't take well to excuses.
translation.zh: 德雷格不喜欢听借口

translation.en: This is what he gave me last time I showed up empty-handed.
translation.zh: 这是上次我空手见他 他给我留下的

translation.en: He promised to be far less understanding in the future.
translation.zh: 他说如果再有下次 还有更好看的

translation.en: All right, look, we don't know anything about a dragon thief
translation.zh: 好吧 我们根本不知道什么偷龙贼

translation.en: or an ice-spitting dragon
translation.zh: 也不知道什么喷冰龙

translation.en: or your lunatic boss and his dragon army, okay?
translation.zh: 更不知道你那疯子老板 和他的龙族军队 明白吗？

translation.en: Just give us back our dragon and we'll go,
translation.zh: 只要把我们的龙还给我们 我们马上就走

translation.en: strange, hostile person whom we've never met.
translation.zh: 这位充满敌意的陌生人

translation.en: Oh, where are my manners? [chuckles]
translation.zh: 瞧瞧我 真是一点礼貌都没有

translation.en: I'm Eret, son of Eret.
translation.zh: 我是埃雷特 埃雷特家族的长子

translation.en: Finest dragon trapper alive.
translation.zh: 世上最好的捕龙猎手

translation.en: After all, it's not just anyone who can capture a Night Fury.
translation.zh: 毕竟 能捕获夜煞的人不是平庸之辈

translation.en: This is Toothless. He says we're going. Now.
translation.zh: 这位是没牙仔 它说我们现在就得走了

translation.en: They all say that.
translation.zh: 真没创意

translation.en: Rush 'em, lads!
translation.zh: 动手 伙计们

translation.en: Stormfly! Come on! Go! Go!
translation.zh: 风里飞 快走

translation.en: You will never hold on to those dragons, you hear me?
translation.zh: 你们是留不住那些龙的 听到了吗？

translation.en: Drago is coming for them all!
translation.zh: 德雷格会来找你要的

translation.en: -[Fishlegs] Come on, Meatlug! -[Tuffnut] Whoo-hoo!
translation.zh: 快点 肉耳朵

translation.en: [man] Hey, there, Stoick! Hey, how are you? Beautiful day.
translation.zh: -你好 斯多戈 -你好 天气不错

translation.en: Hello, Spitelout. Great race.
translation.zh: 斯派特劳特 比赛很精彩

translation.en: Oh, sorry, Mrs. Ack.
translation.zh: 抱歉 艾克夫人

translation.en: Any sign of him?
translation.zh: 还没找到他？

translation.en: Ah! He's probably flown off the edge of the world by now.
translation.zh: 他现在可能已经飞到天边去了

translation.en: Are you sure you want that kid running the village?
translation.zh: 你确定要让那孩子来管理村庄吗？

translation.en: You can still delay your retirement.
translation.zh: 你完全可以推迟退休的

translation.en: He's ready. You'll see.
translation.zh: 他准备好了 放心吧

translation.en: [laughs] There he is! Huh? The pride of Berk!
translation.zh: 他回来了 博克岛的骄傲

translation.en: Who finally decided to show up for work. Yay.
translation.zh: 你总算决定回来工作了

translation.en: Sorry. Got held up.
translation.zh: 抱歉 回来晚了

translation.en: Hey, Dad, could I have a word?
translation.zh: 爸爸 能说句话吗？

translation.en: Something you're itching to tell me?
translation.zh: 有什么事想告诉我吗？

translation.en: Not quite the itch you're thinking of, but yes.
translation.zh: 不是你想的那件事 不过 是的

translation.en: Good man! Now, lesson one.
translation.zh: 很好 好了 第一课 头领的首要责任是他的民众

translation.en: A chief's first duty is to his people, so, 41?
translation.zh: 头领的首要责任是他的民众 -那么 41号 -我们能私下谈谈吗？

translation.en: -Can we just talk in private? -Forty…
translation.zh: -那么 41号 -我们能私下谈谈吗？ -41号 -是我 我是下一个

translation.en: That's me! That's me! I'm next!
translation.zh: -41号 -是我 我是下一个

translation.en: If we could just talk… Excuse me. I have been here all day.
translation.zh: -我只想说… -抱歉 我等一天了

translation.en: Okay, okay. I want one of those high seaters
translation.zh: 好了 我想要一个高龙鞍

translation.en: with lots of spikes and a big stowage compartment.
translation.zh: 有好多尖刺 而且储物箱要大一些

translation.en: Absolutely. You got it, sir.
translation.zh: -没问题 你就放心吧 -太好了

translation.en: This is actually a little more important than building saddles.
translation.zh: 爸爸 我要说的 比造龙鞍更重要

translation.en: Lesson two. No task is too small
translation.zh: 第二课 一定要记住

translation.en: when it comes to serving your people.
translation.zh: 为民众服务没有小事

translation.en: Excuse us, Grump.
translation.zh: -爸爸 -真抱歉 格拉姆

translation.en: Dad, can we just talk…
translation.zh: 我们现在能不能…

translation.en: [Gobber] Grump! You let the forge die down again!
translation.zh: 格拉姆 你怎么又让炉火灭了？

translation.en: [Gobber] That's it, Grump. You're going up for adoption.
translation.zh: -拿着这个 -好吧 够了 格拉姆 你就等着被领养吧

translation.en: There you go. Go on. Have away.
translation.zh: -爸爸 -继续 随便挑

translation.en: Seriously, I really need to tell you
translation.zh: 好 说真的 我得跟你说说

translation.en: about this new land we came across.
translation.zh: 我们刚发现的新大陆的事

translation.en: -Another one? -Any new dragons?
translation.zh: -又发现一个？ -有新的龙吗？

translation.en: We didn't stick around to find out.
translation.zh: 我们没在那里停留太久

translation.en: These folks weren't particularly friendly.
translation.zh: 那里的人不太友好

translation.en: Oh, really? Your Night Fury and Deadly Nadder
translation.zh: 真的吗？你们的夜煞和致命纳德

translation.en: didn't bring them cheering to the rooftops?
translation.zh: 没让他们欢呼雀跃吗？

translation.en: No, this was different.
translation.zh: 不 这次情况不一样

translation.en: Not the standard run-for-the-hills hoo-ha I've come to enjoy.
translation.zh: 没有兴高采烈的欢迎仪式

translation.en: These guys were trappers.
translation.zh: 这帮家伙都是猎手

translation.en: Dragon trappers.
translation.zh: 专门猎龙的

translation.en: You should have seen their fort.
translation.zh: 你们没看见他们的堡垒

translation.en: All blown apart and stuck in giant spikes of ice. It was weird!
translation.zh: 到处都是巨大的冰凌 一片狼藉 看上去很奇怪

translation.en: I've never seen anything like it.
translation.zh: 我从没见过那样的情景

translation.en: And worst of all, they thought we did it!
translation.zh: 最糟糕的是 他们认为是我们干的

translation.en: You two are gonna get yourselves
translation.zh: 你们俩总有一天

translation.en: in serious trouble one of these days.
translation.zh: 会给自己惹上大麻烦

translation.en: Not everyone appreciates this way of life.
translation.zh: 并不是所有人 都喜欢我们维京人的生活方式

translation.en: Aye, Gobber's right, son.
translation.zh: 是的 高博说得对 儿子

translation.en: Best we keep to our own.
translation.zh: 我们最好待在家乡

translation.en: Besides, you'll have more important uses for your time.
translation.zh: 再说了 你还有更重要的事要做

translation.en: Once we make the big announcement!
translation.zh: 马上我就要宣布重大决定了

translation.en: They are building a dragon army.
translation.zh: 他们在组建龙族军队

translation.en: Or at least the guy they work for is.
translation.zh: 至少他们的老板在组建龙族大军

translation.en: Dargo Bloody Fist, or something.
translation.zh: 叫什么德雷格 喂死它

translation.en: I'll bloody his fist with my face if he tries to take my dragon!
translation.zh: 管他什么 喂死它 还是锤死它 -敢来抓龙我就弄死他 -我也是

translation.en: Or mine!
translation.zh: -敢来抓龙我就弄死他 -我也是

translation.en: [groans] You're such a moron.
translation.zh: 你真是个白痴

translation.en: A beautiful moron. -Yeah. -[groans]
translation.zh: -但是个漂亮的白痴 -是啊

translation.en: Bludvist? Drago Bludvist?
translation.zh: 布拉德维斯特 -德雷格布拉德维斯特？ -对 等等

translation.en: Yeah. Wait.
translation.zh: -德雷格布拉德维斯特？ -对 等等

translation.en: You know him?
translation.zh: 你认识他？

translation.en: Ground all dragons! [Hiccup] What? Why?
translation.zh: -把龙看好 -什么？为什么？

translation.en: [Stoick] Seal the gates!
translation.zh: 关闭大门

translation.en: Lower the storm doors!
translation.zh: 把防护门也关上

translation.en: Wait! What is happening?
translation.zh: 等等 到底怎么回事？

translation.en: [Gobber] Come on! You heard the man! Lock it down.
translation.zh: 快点 没听见吗？关闭大门

translation.en: [Stoick] No dragon or Viking sets foot off this island until I give the word!
translation.zh: 没有我的命令 任何人 一只龙都不能离开博克岛一步

translation.en: Wait, because some guy you knew is stirring up trouble
translation.zh: 等等 因为一个远离这里的 你的老熟人 至于这么兴师动众吗？

translation.en: in some faraway land?
translation.zh: 你的老熟人 至于这么兴师动众吗？

translation.en: Because Drago Bludvist is a madman
translation.zh: 因为德雷格布拉德维斯特就是个疯子

translation.en: without conscience or mercy.
translation.zh: 心狠手辣 冷酷无情

translation.en: And if he's built a dragon army, gods help us all.
translation.zh: 如果他建立了龙族军队 我们自求多福吧

translation.en: Get them into their pens! Quickly!
translation.zh: 快把它们都圈起来 快点

translation.en: Then, let's ride back out there.
translation.zh: 那我们就回到那儿去

translation.en: We'll follow those trappers to Drago
translation.zh: 跟着猎手去找德雷格

translation.en: and talk some sense into him.
translation.zh: 和他把事情讲清楚

translation.en: No. We fortify the island.
translation.zh: 不 我们就在岛上死守

translation.en: It's our duty to keep the peace!
translation.zh: 维护和平是我们的职责

translation.en: Peace is over, Hiccup. I must prepare you for war.
translation.zh: 和平结束了 小嗝嗝 -得准备迎接战争了 -战争？

translation.en: War?
translation.zh: -得准备迎接战争了 -战争？

translation.en: Dad, if Drago is coming for our dragons,
translation.zh: 爸爸 如果德雷格是冲着我们的龙来的

translation.en: we can't wait around for him to get here.
translation.zh: 我们不能只坐在这里等着

translation.en: Let's go find him and change his mind.
translation.zh: 应该去找到他 改变他的想法

translation.en: No, some minds won't be changed, Hiccup.
translation.zh: 不 有些想法是改变不了的 小嗝嗝

translation.en: Berk is what you need to worry about.
translation.zh: 你现在应该考虑的是博克岛

translation.en: A chief protects his own.
translation.zh: 头领必须保护他的民众

translation.en: [Stoick] Secure the stables! Latch every stall!
translation.zh: 看好龙舍 把门都插好

translation.en: -Hiccup, don't! -I have to.
translation.zh: -小嗝嗝 不要 -我必须去

translation.en: [Stoick] This way! -Quickly! -[Toothless screeches]
translation.zh: 这边 快点

translation.en: [Stoick] Hiccup!
translation.zh: 小嗝嗝

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: 加油

translation.en: Hiccup!
translation.zh: 小嗝嗝

translation.en: Keep your eyes peeled, lads!
translation.zh: 都打起精神 伙计们

translation.en: With this wind, we'll reach Drago by daybreak,
translation.zh: 顺着风 我们拂晓前就能到德雷格那里

translation.en: so best we fill this ship up with dragons, and quick!
translation.zh: 所以我们最好快点把船装满龙

translation.en: It's no time to be picky.
translation.zh: 没时间挑剔了

translation.en: Uh… Eret? Not if we want to keep our…
translation.zh: -埃雷特 -除非我们不想要…

translation.en: Heads! Off the port quarter!
translation.zh: 脑袋了 左舷上方45度

translation.en: Net them, lads! Take them down!
translation.zh: 网住它们 伙计们 把他们打下来

translation.en: You're not getting away this time.
translation.zh: 这回看你们往哪跑

translation.en: Fire!
translation.zh: 发射

translation.en: Reload!
translation.zh: 重新装弹

translation.en: [trapper] Reload! Incoming!
translation.zh: 重新装弹 过来了

translation.en: [Eret] And here I was, worried we might turn up empty-handed.
translation.zh: 本来以为我们会空手而归

translation.en: Nope. It's your lucky day.
translation.zh: 不 你今天很幸运

translation.en: -[gasps] -We give up.
translation.zh: 我们投降

translation.en: That's one Night Fury, one Deadly Nadder,
translation.zh: 你有了一个夜煞 一个致命纳德

translation.en: and two of the finest dragon riders west of Luk Tuk.
translation.zh: 还有来自拉克塔克的两个顶级龙骑士

translation.en: That ought to make the boss happy, right?
translation.zh: 这下你的老板会很开心 对吗？

translation.en: -[growls] -Excuse us.
translation.zh: 抱歉 请让让

translation.en: -[Astrid whispers] What are you doing? -Toothless, stay.
translation.zh: 你在干什么？ 没牙仔 留在这儿

translation.en: Uh, the dragons don't care for cramped spaces,
translation.zh: 龙实在是太占地方了

translation.en: so they'll just hang out with you.
translation.zh: 就跟你们在一起吧

translation.en: They won't be any trouble.
translation.zh: 它们很听话

translation.en: Unless you do that.
translation.zh: 除非你惹了它们

translation.en: You know, wooden boat, big ocean. How is your swimming?
translation.zh: 想想吧 一只木船 在大海深处 -你们的游泳技术怎么样？ -不太好

translation.en: Not good.
translation.zh: -你们的游泳技术怎么样？ -不太好

translation.en: Oops! Almost forgot. You can't have armed prisoners.
translation.zh: 哎呀 差点给忘了 俘虏是不能有武器的

translation.en: How is this a plan?
translation.zh: 这算什么计划？

translation.en: Just what every dragon trapper needs.
translation.zh: 这可是猎龙的必备良品

translation.en: One end coats the blade in Monstrous Nightmare saliva.
translation.zh: 一头的刀刃上涂了烈焰狂魔的口水

translation.en: The other sprays Hideous Zippleback gas.
translation.zh: 另一端是喷射双头龙的瓦斯

translation.en: All it takes is a spark, and…
translation.zh: 只需要一个小小的火花

translation.en: -[Hiccup] Yeah, there you go. -[trappers coughing]
translation.zh: 就是这样 一旦它们把你看成了同类

translation.en: [Hiccup] Once they see you as one of their own,
translation.zh: 一旦它们把你看成了同类 再暴躁的龙也能驯服 对吧 老兄？

translation.en: even the testiest dragons can be trained. Right, bud?
translation.zh: 再暴躁的龙也能驯服 对吧 老兄？

translation.en: Give me that! [grunts]
translation.zh: 把它给我

translation.en: What game are you playing?
translation.zh: 你到底想耍什么花招？

translation.en: [Hiccup] No game. We just wanna meet Drago.
translation.zh: 没耍花招 我们就是想见德雷格

translation.en: [grunts] Why?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: Because I'm going to change his mind about dragons.
translation.zh: 因为我会改变他对龙的看法

translation.en: He can be really persuasive.
translation.zh: 他肯定能说服德雷格的

translation.en: Once you've earned his loyalty,
translation.zh: 一旦你真正收服了它

translation.en: there is nothing a dragon won't do for you.
translation.zh: 你想做什么 它都会帮你做到的

translation.en: [blows raspberry] You won't be changing any minds around here.
translation.zh: 我看你连我们这几个人都说服不了

translation.en: I can change yours.
translation.zh: 起码能说服你

translation.en: Right here. Right now.
translation.zh: 就在这儿 就现在

translation.en: Uh… May I?
translation.zh: 可以吗？

translation.en: Dragon riders!
translation.zh: -小心 -是龙骑士

translation.en: [Hiccup] Put me down!
translation.zh: 放我下去 鼻涕虫

translation.en: Snotlout, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 放我下去 鼻涕虫 你在干什么？

translation.en: See how well I protect and provide?
translation.zh: 我的保卫工作很到位吧？

translation.en: -[gasps] -What is with all the nets?
translation.zh: 哪来的这么多网？

translation.en: [Ruffnut] Hey, watch it! That was… Close.
translation.zh: 小心 差点就被网住了

translation.en: Oh, my.
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: Me likey.
translation.zh: 我好喜欢

translation.en: Take me.
translation.zh: 抓我吧

translation.en: Hold your fire! [grunts]
translation.zh: 你们住手

translation.en: [grunts] What are you guys doing here?
translation.zh: 你们在这里干什么呢？

translation.en: We're here to rescue you!
translation.zh: 我们是来救你的

translation.en: I don't need to be rescued! [Stoick] Enough!
translation.zh: -我不需要人救 -够了

translation.en: Well, didn't you just pick the wrong ship?
translation.zh: 你们是不是上错船了？

translation.en: I am Eret, son of [muffled] Eret.
translation.zh: 我是埃雷特 埃雷特家族的…

translation.en: [grunts] I'm…
translation.zh: 我是…

translation.en: [straining] Get this thing off me.
translation.zh: 快把它挪开

translation.en: -Anyone else? -[Eret grunting]
translation.zh: 还有谁不服？

translation.en: That's what I figured.
translation.zh: 我猜也是

translation.en: You, saddle up. We're going home.
translation.zh: 你骑上龙跟我回家

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Of all the irresponsible--
translation.zh: 你要想想自己的责任

translation.en: I'm trying to protect our dragons and stop a war!
translation.zh: 我是想要保护我们的龙 要制止战争 这怎么就不负责任了？

translation.en: How is that irresponsible?
translation.zh: 要制止战争 这怎么就不负责任了？

translation.en: Because war is what he wants, son!
translation.zh: 因为战争就是他想要的 儿子

translation.en: Years ago, there was a great gathering of chieftains
translation.zh: 很多年前 部落首领们集会

translation.en: to discuss the dragon scourge we all faced.
translation.zh: 商讨我们面对的龙灾

translation.en: Into our midst came a stranger from a strange land,
translation.zh: 我们中有一个来自其他岛屿的陌生人

translation.en: covered in scars and draped in a cloak of dragon skin.
translation.zh: 他全身都是伤痕 披着一张龙皮斗篷

translation.en: He carried no weapon,
translation.zh: 他没有带武器 说话声音很轻

translation.en: and spoke softly, saying that he,
translation.zh: 他没有带武器 说话声音很轻 他说他是德雷格布拉德维斯特

translation.en: Drago Bludvist, was a man of the people,
translation.zh: 他说他是德雷格布拉德维斯特 是一介平民

translation.en: devoted to freeing mankind from the tyranny of dragons.
translation.zh: 要把人类从恶龙肆虐的灾难中解救出来

translation.en: He claimed that he alone could control the dragons
translation.zh: 说他一个人就能制服龙

translation.en: and that he alone could keep us safe,
translation.zh: 一个人就能保证我们大家的安全 只要我们都臣服于他 追随他

translation.en: if we chose to bow down and follow him.
translation.zh: 只要我们都臣服于他 追随他

translation.en: -Stupid. -Good one.
translation.zh: -蠢货 -真会说笑

translation.en: Aye, we laughed, too.
translation.zh: 对 我们都笑他

translation.en: Until he wrapped himself in his cloak and cried out,
translation.zh: 直到他把斗篷扯下来 露出本来面目

translation.en: "Then see how well you do without me!"
translation.zh: 他大喊 看看没有我你们会怎么样？ 看看没有我你们会怎么样？

translation.en: The rooftop suddenly burst into flames,
translation.zh: 屋顶突然爆炸 燃起了大火

translation.en: and from it, armored dragons descended,
translation.zh: 一条全副武装的龙出现了

translation.en: burning the hall to the ground.
translation.zh: 整个大厅成了一片火海

translation.en: I… was the only one to escape.
translation.zh: 我是唯一逃出来的

translation.en: Men who kill without reason cannot be reasoned with.
translation.zh: 一个杀人恶魔 是根本没有道理可讲的

translation.en: -Maybe. -Hiccup!
translation.zh: -也许吧 -小嗝嗝

translation.en: [Hiccup] I'm still going to try.
translation.zh: 但我还是要试试

translation.en: This is what I'm good at.
translation.zh: 这正是我最擅长的

translation.en: And if I could change your mind,
translation.zh: 如果我可以改变你的态度

translation.en: I can change his, too.
translation.zh: 那我也能改变他

translation.en: Come on.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: -Let's go. -[Stoick] No!
translation.zh: -我们走 -不

translation.en: Lead the others back to Berk.
translation.zh: 带其他人回博克岛

translation.en: I've had enough mutiny for one day.
translation.zh: 我不想再有第二个人违抗命令

translation.en: Ooh, I like that.
translation.zh: 身材真棒

translation.en: [Stoick] Ruffnut! [groans] Okay!
translation.zh: -拉芙纳特 -来了

translation.en: [sighs] Don't worry, bud.
translation.zh: 别担心 伙计

translation.en: I'm not gonna let anything happen to you. I promise.
translation.zh: 我绝对不会让你出事的 我保证

translation.en: Oh, come on, Dad! Really?
translation.zh: 拜托 老爸 不是吧？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: No sudden moves.
translation.zh: 别轻举妄动

translation.en: Hold on. Hold on.
translation.zh: 稳住了

translation.en: Toothless!
translation.zh: 没牙仔

translation.en: Hey! You left my dragon back there!
translation.zh: 喂 你不能把我的龙扔下不管

translation.en: He can't fly on his own! He will drown!
translation.zh: 它自己不能飞 会淹死的

translation.en: Uh, we have to head back for my dragon!
translation.zh: 我们得回去找我的龙

translation.en: Who are you? The dragon thief?
translation.zh: 你是谁？是偷龙贼吗？

translation.en: Drago Bludvist?
translation.zh: 德雷格布拉德维斯特？

translation.en: Do you even understand what I'm saying?
translation.zh: 你到底能不能听懂我说的话？

translation.en: Toothless! It's okay, it's okay, it's okay.
translation.zh: 没牙仔 好了 没事了

translation.en: I'm glad to see you, too, bud.
translation.zh: 没想到还能见到你

translation.en: -You really had me worried there. -[Toothless grumbles]
translation.zh: 你真是让我担心死了

translation.en: [muffled] Hiccup?
translation.zh: 小嗝嗝？

translation.en: Could it be?
translation.zh: 怎么可能？

translation.en: After all these years?
translation.zh: 都过去了这么多年了

translation.en: How is this possible?
translation.zh: 这怎么可能？

translation.en: Uh, should I… Should I know you?
translation.zh: 我说 我们很熟吗？

translation.en: No, you were only a babe.
translation.zh: 不 那时你还很小

translation.en: But a mother never forgets.
translation.zh: 但是妈妈永远不会忘的

translation.en: Come.
translation.zh: 过来

translation.en: [Stoick] Boar-headed! Just like his mother!
translation.zh: 这个犟种 跟他妈妈一样

translation.en: Aye, she could never stay put either.
translation.zh: 从来就没有过消停的时候

translation.en: [Gobber] He's just 20.
translation.zh: 他已经20岁 是个维京人了

translation.en: And a Viking. Could there be a worse combination?
translation.zh: 他已经20岁 是个维京人了 我是说 还有什么能比这更糟的呢？

translation.en: [scoffs] When I think of how stubborn and senseless you were back in the day…
translation.zh: 这让我想起了当年你有多固执 从不听人劝

translation.en: Well, not much has changed, actually.
translation.zh: 就算老了也没改多少

translation.en: [sighs] Ah, you know what he's like. He won't give up, Gobber.
translation.zh: 你知道他就这性子 从不放弃 高博

translation.en: And if Hiccup finds Drago, before we find him…
translation.zh: 要是在他被我们发现之前 先找到了德雷格

translation.en: Nothing can hurt Hiccup
translation.zh: 没什么能伤害小嗝嗝

translation.en: so long as that Night Fury's around. It's a Night Fury!
translation.zh: 只要有夜煞在 那不是夜煞吗？

translation.en: Find them, Skullcrusher. Find them.
translation.zh: 快去找他们 雷鼓龙 一定要找到

translation.en: Hold on. Wait just a minute. -This way! -Come back here!
translation.zh: -等一下 你等等 -这边

translation.en: Come.
translation.zh: -你回来 -快点

translation.en: You can't just say something like that and run off!
translation.zh: 你不能什么都不说就这么跑啊

translation.en: You're my mother? I mean, what the…
translation.zh: 你是我妈妈？这是什么情况？

translation.en: Do you grasp how insane it sounds?
translation.zh: 你知道这听起来有多疯狂吗？

translation.en: Come, quickly! I have questions! [grunts]
translation.zh: -快走 快点 -我有问题要问你

translation.en: Where have you been all this time?
translation.zh: 这么多年你都跑哪去了？

translation.en: What have you been doing?
translation.zh: 你一直以来都在做什么？

translation.en: But they said you were dead!
translation.zh: 他们说你已经死了

translation.en: Everyone thinks you were eaten by…
translation.zh: 大家都说你被吃掉了…

translation.en: This is where you've been for 20 years?
translation.zh: 你就在这里生活了20年吗？

translation.en: You've been rescuing them.
translation.zh: 你在拯救它们？

translation.en: Unbelievable. You're not upset?
translation.zh: -真不可思议 -你不生气吗？

translation.en: What? No. [stammering] I don't know.
translation.zh: 什么？不 我不知道

translation.en: It's a bit much to get my head around, to be frank.
translation.zh: 老实说 我的脑袋有点反应不过来

translation.en: It's not every day you find out
translation.zh: 毕竟不是每天都有人说是我妈妈

translation.en: your mother is some kind of crazy, feral,
translation.zh: 毕竟不是每天都有人说是我妈妈 这人还是个能骑着龙飞来飞去的女士

translation.en: vigilante dragon lady.
translation.zh: 这人还是个能骑着龙飞来飞去的女士

translation.en: At least I'm not boring, right?
translation.zh: 至少我不是个无聊的人 对吗？

translation.en: I suppose there is that one specific thing.
translation.zh: 我想这恐怕是最刺激的经历了

translation.en: Do you like it?
translation.zh: 那你喜欢吗？

translation.en: I don't have the words.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么说

translation.en: Can I…
translation.zh: 我可以吗？

translation.en: Oh, he's beautiful.
translation.zh: 可真漂亮啊

translation.en: Incredible!
translation.zh: 真不可思议

translation.en: He might very well be the last of his kind.
translation.zh: 它可能是它们种族的最后一只了

translation.en: And look, he's your age.
translation.zh: 你看 它跟你同岁

translation.en: No wonder you get along so well.
translation.zh: 难怪你们相处得那么好

translation.en: [gasps] And retractable teeth!
translation.zh: 可以伸缩的牙齿

translation.en: How did you manage to…
translation.zh: 你是怎么…

translation.en: I found him in the woods.
translation.zh: 我在树林里发现它的

translation.en: He was shot down and wounded.
translation.zh: 它被打了下来 受了伤

translation.en: This Snafflefang lost his leg to one of Drago Bludvist's iron traps.
translation.zh: 这是毒牙龙 德雷格布拉德维斯特的陷阱 让他失去了一条腿

translation.en: This Raincutter had her wing sliced by razor netting.
translation.zh: 这是雨中梭 被网上的刀片彻底毁了翅膀

translation.en: And this poor Hobblegrunt
translation.zh: 还有这个可怜的小家伙

translation.en: was blinded by a tree snare
translation.zh: 被树上的机关弄瞎了眼睛

translation.en: and then left to die alone and scared.
translation.zh: 在绝望和孤独中等死

translation.en: And what of this?
translation.zh: 这个呢？

translation.en: Did Drago or his trappers do this, too?
translation.zh: 也是德雷格和猎手们的杰作吗？

translation.en: The crazy thing is…
translation.zh: 这个是例外

translation.en: I'm actually the one who shot him down.
translation.zh: 这个是被我给打下来的

translation.en: Hey, it's okay, though.
translation.zh: 不过 没关系了

translation.en: He got me back! Right, bud?
translation.zh: 它已经报仇了 对吧 伙计？

translation.en: You couldn't save all of me, could you?
translation.zh: 你可是一点没吃亏 对吧？

translation.en: You just had to make it even.
translation.zh: 你非得跟我扯平

translation.en: So, peg leg!
translation.zh: 你非得跟我扯平 所以我失去了一条腿

translation.en: What did your father think of your Night Fury friend?
translation.zh: 你爸爸是怎么看待你的夜煞朋友？

translation.en: He didn't take it all that well.
translation.zh: 他一开始并不接受

translation.en: But then he changed.
translation.zh: 但他后来改变了

translation.en: They all did.
translation.zh: 他们都是

translation.en: Pretty soon, everyone back home had dragons of their own.
translation.zh: 很快大家都有了属于自己的龙

translation.en: -If only it were possible. -No, really.
translation.zh: 真是这样就好了 不 是真的

translation.en: Believe me, I tried, as well,
translation.zh: 相信我 我曾经试过

translation.en: but people are not capable of change, Hiccup.
translation.zh: 但人是不会改变的 小嗝嗝

translation.en: Some of us were just born different.
translation.zh: 而有些人 生来就是不一样的

translation.en: [man] Hoist the torches!
translation.zh: 火把再高一点

translation.en: [Valka] Berk was a land of "kill-or-be-killed,"
translation.zh: 尽管 这是个弱肉强食的地方

translation.en: but I believed peace was possible.
translation.zh: 但我仍然相信和平是有可能的

translation.en: Stop! You'll only make it worse!
translation.zh: 住手 这样只会越来越糟

translation.en: [Valka] It was a very unpopular opinion.
translation.zh: 很显然没人接受我的劝告

translation.en: [gasps] Hiccup!
translation.zh: 小嗝嗝

translation.en: [Valka] Then, one night, a dragon broke into our house,
translation.zh: 一天晚上 一条龙闯进了我们的屋子

translation.en: finding you in the cradle.
translation.zh: 发现了摇篮里的你

translation.en: I rushed to protect you.
translation.zh: 我冲过去要保护你

translation.en: But what I saw
translation.zh: 但是我看到的

translation.en: was proof of everything I believed.
translation.zh: 却证明了我一直以来的信念

translation.en: This wasn't a vicious beast,
translation.zh: 它根本不是邪恶的怪兽

translation.en: but an intelligent, gentle creature,
translation.zh: 相反 它很聪明 而且很善良

translation.en: whose soul reflected my own.
translation.zh: 让我无法不对它敞开胸怀

translation.en: [Stoick] Valka, run! [Valka] No! Don't!
translation.zh: -沃尔卡 快走 -不要

translation.en: Hold on!
translation.zh: 坚持住

translation.en: [Valka] No! Stoick! [Stoick] Valka!
translation.zh: -不 斯多戈 -沃尔卡

translation.en: [Valka] Stoick!
translation.zh: 斯多戈

translation.en: Valka.
translation.zh: 沃尔卡

translation.en: [Valka] You and your father nearly died that night,
translation.zh: 那天晚上你们父子差点送命

translation.en: all because I couldn't kill a dragon.
translation.zh: 就因为我不肯杀那条龙

translation.en: It runs in the family.
translation.zh: 这是家族遗传啊

translation.en: It broke my heart to stay away,
translation.zh: 离开你们 我很伤心

translation.en: but I believed you would be safer if I did.
translation.zh: 但我相信 只有我离开 你们才会更安全

translation.en: How did you survive?
translation.zh: 你是怎么活下来的？

translation.en: Oh, Cloudjumper never meant to harm me.
translation.zh: 云中跃从来没有想要伤害我

translation.en: He must have thought I belonged here.
translation.zh: 它一定是觉得我属于这里

translation.en: In the home of the great Bewilderbeast.
translation.zh: 应该待在野生飞龙的大家庭里

translation.en: The alpha species.
translation.zh: 阿尔法种族

translation.en: One of the very few that still exist.
translation.zh: 是现存不多的种族之一

translation.en: Every nest has its queen,
translation.zh: 每个巢穴都有个女王

translation.en: but this is the king of all dragons.
translation.zh: 但这个是所有龙的王

translation.en: With his icy breath, this graceful giant built our nest.
translation.zh: 这个优雅的大家伙 用它的冰之魔法为我们营造了龙之乐园

translation.en: A safe haven for dragons everywhere.
translation.zh: 世界上最安全的龙之天堂

translation.en: Wait, that's the ice-spitter?
translation.zh: 就是那只会喷冰的龙？

translation.en: He's responsible for all that destruction?
translation.zh: 埃雷特的营地就是它给毁掉的？

translation.en: He protects us.
translation.zh: 它保护着我们

translation.en: We all live under his care and his command.
translation.zh: 我们都在它的照顾之下 也遵从它的命令

translation.en: [Valka] All but the babies, of course,
translation.zh: 当然小家伙们除外

translation.en: who listen to no one!
translation.zh: 它们谁的话也不会听的

translation.en: I've lived among them for 20 years, Hiccup,
translation.zh: 我已经和它们在一起 相处了20年 小嗝嗝

translation.en: discovering their secrets.
translation.zh: 探索它们的秘密

translation.en: -He likes you. -Wow.
translation.zh: 它喜欢你

translation.en: You must be hungry.
translation.zh: 你一定饿了吧

translation.en: Uh. Yeah, I could eat.
translation.zh: -好吧 吃点也行 -很好

translation.en: Good. It's feeding time.
translation.zh: 吃饭时间到了

translation.en: I don't like it.
translation.zh: 我不喜欢这样

translation.en: They should have been back with Hiccup by now.
translation.zh: 他们早该把小嗝嗝带回来了

translation.en: I don't like it either. Eret, son of Eret
translation.zh: 我也不喜欢这样 可爱的埃雷特就是我梦中情人

translation.en: was the man of my dreams. My everything!
translation.zh: 可爱的埃雷特就是我梦中情人 他是我的一切

translation.en: But, baby, I grew facial hair for you.
translation.zh: 宝贝 我为你留了胡子

translation.en: Me, too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: What if Drago shot them down?
translation.zh: 他们要是被德雷格打下来怎么办？

translation.en: What if they need our help?
translation.zh: 万一他们需要帮助呢？

translation.en: We have to find them.
translation.zh: 我们必须找到他们

translation.en: Wait, what? No, but Stoick said…
translation.zh: 等等 什么？但斯多戈说…

translation.en: It doesn't matter what he said,
translation.zh: 要是他们都被抓了

translation.en: if they have all been captured. Come on!
translation.zh: 他说什么都不重要了 来吧

translation.en: [trapper] Do we go back?
translation.zh: 我们回去吗？

translation.en: [Eret] We have nowhere to go, nothing to sell,
translation.zh: 我们哪都不能去 空手而归 你们都知道会是什么下场

translation.en: and no heads to call our own!
translation.zh: 空手而归 你们都知道会是什么下场

translation.en: If we don't turn up with dragons, and fast… [screams]
translation.zh: 如果我们不赶快追上那些龙

translation.en: Careful what you wish for!
translation.zh: 好的不灵 坏的灵 别傻看着

translation.en: Eret, son of Eret!
translation.zh: 埃雷特 埃雷特家族的长子 我们会怀念你的

translation.en: -What is this? -A kidnapping.
translation.zh: -你在干什么？ -绑架你啊

translation.en: Yay! Can he ride with me? Can he? [huskily] Can he?
translation.zh: 让他跟我在一起飞吧 行吗？

translation.en: You're gonna show us the way to Drago.
translation.zh: 最好告诉我们怎么去找德雷格

translation.en: And help dragon riders sneak into Drago's camp? Just kill me now.
translation.zh: 帮那些龙骑士溜进德雷格的营地？ 还是杀了我吧

translation.en: That could be arranged. Stormfly, drop it!
translation.zh: 我可以成全你 风里飞 扔下去

translation.en: Good girl! Stormfly, fetch!
translation.zh: 好孩子 风里飞 抓回来

translation.en: Okay! I'll take you to Drago!
translation.zh: 好吧 我带你们去找德雷格

translation.en: Works every time.
translation.zh: 真是屡试不爽

translation.en: Hey, I thought we were going to eat. Oh, we are.
translation.zh: -我记得你说去吃东西 -没错

translation.en: Then, from Dragon Island, I found this archipelago…
translation.zh: 在飞龙岛旁边 我发现了这个群岛

translation.en: [Valka] There.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Whoo-hoo!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: [Valka] Oh, when I'm up here
translation.zh: 飞上天的时候

translation.en: I don't even feel the cold. I just feel…
translation.zh: 我都不会感觉到冷 只觉得…

translation.en: Free.
translation.zh: 自由

translation.en: [inhales] This is what it is to be a dragon, Hiccup.
translation.zh: 这就是做一条龙的感觉 小嗝嗝

translation.en: It's all well and good to call yourself a dragon,
translation.zh: 我知道你为什么把自己当成龙了

translation.en: but can you fly?
translation.zh: 但是 你能飞吗？

translation.en: Oh, no!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: -Man! Almost! -[sneezes]
translation.zh: 伙计 就差一点点

translation.en: We just about had it that time!
translation.zh: 我们差点就成功了

translation.en: Incredible.
translation.zh: 真不敢相信

translation.en: Well, not bad yourself.
translation.zh: 你也不赖

translation.en: All this time, you took after me.
translation.zh: 这么多年 你越来越像我了

translation.en: And where was I?
translation.zh: 但是 我又在哪呢？

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Hiccup.
translation.zh: 妈妈很抱歉 小嗝嗝

translation.en: Can we start over?
translation.zh: 我们能重新开始吗？

translation.en: Will you give me another chance?
translation.zh: 能给妈妈一次机会吗？

translation.en: I can teach you all that I have learned these past 20 years.
translation.zh: 我可以把这20年来 我学到的东西都教给你

translation.en: -Like… -[moans]
translation.zh: 比如…

translation.en: Now you can make those tight turns.
translation.zh: 现在 你可以急转弯了

translation.en: Did you know about this?
translation.zh: 你以前知道这个吗？

translation.en: Every dragon has its secrets.
translation.zh: 每条龙都有它的秘密

translation.en: And I'll show them all to you.
translation.zh: 这些我都会告诉你的

translation.en: We'll unlock every mystery,
translation.zh: 我们去解开所有的谜

translation.en: find every last species together,
translation.zh: 找到每一个珍贵物种

translation.en: as mother and son.
translation.zh: 妈妈带着儿子一起去

translation.en: This gift we share, Hiccup, it bonds us.
translation.zh: 小嗝嗝 这种共有的天赋连结着我们

translation.en: This is who you are, son.
translation.zh: 这才是真正的你 孩子

translation.en: Who we are.
translation.zh: 真正的我们

translation.en: We will change the world for all dragons.
translation.zh: 为了龙我们要去改变这个世界

translation.en: We will make it a better, safer place.
translation.zh: 把它变成更美好、更安全的地方

translation.en: Yeah. I mean… That sounds amazing.
translation.zh: 对 没错 这主意听上去不错

translation.en: This is so great!
translation.zh: 简直是太棒了

translation.en: Now you and I can go talk to Drago together.
translation.zh: 你和我可以一起去找德雷格谈谈

translation.en: What? There's no talking to Drago.
translation.zh: 什么？跟德雷格没什么好谈的

translation.en: -But we have to… -No.
translation.zh: 但我们必须…

translation.en: We must protect our own.
translation.zh: 不 我们必须先保护好自己人

translation.en: Come on, we should be getting back.
translation.zh: 好了 我们应该回去了

translation.en: Okay! Look, I got you here. Now get this thing off me.
translation.zh: 好吧 我带你们过来了 快让这东西放开我

translation.en: Never take a toy from a dragon. Don't you know anything?
translation.zh: 永远别跟龙抢玩具 连这也不知道吗？

translation.en: Why does this keep happening to me?
translation.zh: 为什么倒霉的总是我呢？

translation.en: What's down there?
translation.zh: 水里是什么东西？

translation.en: Large diameter bubbles, massive lungs,
translation.zh: 直径巨大的气泡 说明肺部很大

translation.en: cold water deep dweller.
translation.zh: 生活在冰冷的深水

translation.en: I'm thinking class-five leviathan, maybe six.
translation.zh: 我想是五级海怪 也许是六级

translation.en: [Fishlegs] Meatlug! What's wrong, girl?
translation.zh: -肉耳朵 你怎么了？ -毒牙 快过来

translation.en: [Eret] Drago!
translation.zh: 德雷格

translation.en: Get off me!
translation.zh: 你放开我

translation.en: [Eret chuckles] Always great to see you, my friend!
translation.zh: 见到你总是很高兴 我的朋友

translation.en: Keeping warm up here?
translation.zh: 这儿一直这么热闹

translation.en: Well, as you can see, I'm right on time
translation.zh: 你看到了 我可是按时送来了这批新货

translation.en: with a new batch of dragons,
translation.zh: 我可是按时送来了这批新货

translation.en: just like I promised.
translation.zh: 绝对信守承诺

translation.en: [man] He's waking up!
translation.zh: -它醒了 -抓紧绳子

translation.en: Give me some backup, here!
translation.zh: -帮帮我 -当心

translation.en: Drop the ropes!
translation.zh: 放开绳子

translation.en: -[Snotlout] Hookfang! -[Ruffnut] Hey! What are you doing?
translation.zh: -毒牙 -你在干什么？

translation.en: You belong to me now.
translation.zh: 你现在属于我

translation.en: [Eret] And as an added bonus…
translation.zh: 而且是买一送一

translation.en: I also caught you their riders.
translation.zh: 我把它们的骑士也抓来了

translation.en: -No extra charge. -What?
translation.zh: 就当是赠品吧 什么？你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: -Are you kidding me? -Aw!
translation.zh: 什么？你在开玩笑吗？

translation.en: But you were so perfect!
translation.zh: 可你简直太完美了

translation.en: Turns out, there is a whole bunch of them out there.
translation.zh: 结果发现 外面还有很多龙和骑士

translation.en: How many?
translation.zh: 有多少？

translation.en: Drago doesn't have them after all.
translation.zh: 他们没有落在德雷格手里

translation.en: -How many? -[Astrid] Hundreds.
translation.zh: 到底是多少？ 好几百 整个岛上都是

translation.en: A whole island full!
translation.zh: 好几百 整个岛上都是

translation.en: [coughing] I wouldn't worry about it.
translation.zh: 没必要这么紧张

translation.en: [choking] My men are hunting them down as we speak.
translation.zh: 我们说话的这会儿 我的人正在收拾他们呢

translation.en: They won't know where you're hiding, I promise you that.
translation.zh: 他们不会知道你藏在什么地方的 我保证

translation.en: Yes, they will. They know we're missing,
translation.zh: 不 他们会知道的 他们知道我们失踪了

translation.en: and they have tracking dragons.
translation.zh: 他们有跟踪龙

translation.en: If you so much as touch us, Hiccup is gonna kick--
translation.zh: 你要是再敢这样对待我们 -小嗝嗝一定会把你… -小嗝嗝？

translation.en: -Hiccup? -[Eret] He's not a problem.
translation.zh: -小嗝嗝一定会把你… -小嗝嗝？ 他根本不是问题 真的 相信我

translation.en: Really. Trust me.
translation.zh: 他根本不是问题 真的 相信我

translation.en: He's only the son of Stoick the Vast,
translation.zh: 他是伟大的斯多戈唯一的儿子

translation.en: his heir to the throne of Berk,
translation.zh: 是博克岛王位的继承人

translation.en: and the greatest dragon master this world has ever seen!
translation.zh: 他还是这个世界上前所未有的 最伟大的驯龙大师

translation.en: Dragon master?
translation.zh: 驯龙大师？

translation.en: I alone control the dragons!
translation.zh: 只有我才能控制龙

translation.en: -No. Mmm-mmm. -Sorry.
translation.zh: -不 -抱歉

translation.en: And unless you let us go, right now,
translation.zh: 除非你马上放我们走

translation.en: he will blast through here on his Night Fury
translation.zh: 否则 他的夜煞就会把这里夷为平地

translation.en: and blow your entire fleet of ships to splinters.
translation.zh: 让你的整个舰队瞬间灰飞烟灭

translation.en: Then they will be crying like babies.
translation.zh: 他们会哭得像孩子一样

translation.en: Funny and beautiful. Good one, babe!
translation.zh: -既幽默又漂亮 -说得好 宝贝

translation.en: Like babies, they always cry.
translation.zh: 像孩子一样 总是爱哭鼻子

translation.en: Real tiny ones.
translation.zh: 实在是太小了

translation.en: First, there was one rider, and now, all of Berk.
translation.zh: 原来只有一个骑士 现在整个岛上都是

translation.en: And you led them to me!
translation.zh: 是你把他们引来的

translation.en: [grunts] Drago!
translation.zh: 德雷格

translation.en: Stop all preparations!
translation.zh: 暂停所有准备工作

translation.en: We must attack the dragon riders' nest at once!
translation.zh: 我们马上去攻击驯龙骑士的老巢

translation.en: We will take down their alpha!
translation.zh: 我们一定要消灭他们的阿尔法

translation.en: Then we will take Berk!
translation.zh: -然后 拿下整个博克岛 -好啊

translation.en: Drago. And get rid of him.
translation.zh: -德雷格 -把他处理掉

translation.en: Oh, Drago, please, I…
translation.zh: 德雷格 求你了 我…

translation.en: [Astrid] Stormfly!
translation.zh: 风里飞

translation.en: No! [grunts]
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Well, bud, we can't wait around
translation.zh: 好了 伙计 我们不能这样等着德雷格来攻击这里

translation.en: for Drago to attack this place.
translation.zh: 我们不能这样等着德雷格来攻击这里

translation.en: We've gotta find him first.
translation.zh: 我们必须先找到他

translation.en: Let's go. [muffled gasp]
translation.zh: 我们走吧

translation.en: Easy now.
translation.zh: 别紧张

translation.en: Are you kidding me? How did you get in here?
translation.zh: 开什么玩笑？ 你是怎么进来的？

translation.en: The same way we are getting you out.
translation.zh: -我们会从原路带你出去 -我们？

translation.en: -We? -All clear.
translation.zh: -我们会从原路带你出去 -我们？ 安全了

translation.en: Toothless, come.
translation.zh: -没牙仔 快走 -等等

translation.en: Wait. There's something you need to know.
translation.zh: -没牙仔 快走 -等等 好吧 爸爸 有件事我想应该告诉你

translation.en: [Stoick] Yeah, yeah, tell me on the way.
translation.zh: 好 边走边说吧

translation.en: This isn't an on-the-way kind of update, actually.
translation.zh: 这可不是那种边走边聊的花边新闻

translation.en: I've heard enough.
translation.zh: 我听够了 小嗝嗝

translation.en: More of the earth-shattering-development variety.
translation.zh: 就像是突然发现了新大陆一样

translation.en: Yeah, just add it to the pile.
translation.zh: 对 那就画在地图上吧

translation.en: Dad, unlike most surprises I spring on you, this is one you'll like.
translation.zh: 爸爸 跟以前我给你的惊喜不一样 这次你一定会喜欢的 我保证

translation.en: I promise.
translation.zh: 这次你一定会喜欢的 我保证

translation.en: You just have to handle it delicately.
translation.zh: 你千万要控制好情绪 所以

translation.en: You might want to take this one.
translation.zh: 也许你应该勇敢地去面对

translation.en: Oh, boy.
translation.zh: 天啊

translation.en: Dad, could you put the sword away, please?
translation.zh: 爸爸 拜托你能把剑收起来吗？

translation.en: I know what you're gonna say, Stoick.
translation.zh: 我知道你想说什么 斯多戈

translation.en: How could I have done this?
translation.zh: 我怎么能这么做？

translation.en: Stayed away all of these years?
translation.zh: 这些年为什么一走了之？

translation.en: And why did I not come back to you? To our son?
translation.zh: 为什么不回来找你和儿子？

translation.en: What sign did I have that you could change, Stoick?
translation.zh: 我当初说你不会改变 斯多戈

translation.en: That anyone on Berk could?
translation.zh: 岛上的人都不会改变

translation.en: I pleaded so many times to stop the fighting,
translation.zh: 我曾经恳请过很多次 停止战争

translation.en: to find another answer, but did any of you listen?
translation.zh: 寻找其他途径解决 但你们谁听进去了？

translation.en: This is why I never married.
translation.zh: 所以我才一直不结婚

translation.en: This and one other reason.
translation.zh: 立场问题还有其他原因

translation.en: I know that I left you to raise Hiccup alone,
translation.zh: 我知道你一个人抚养小嗝嗝很艰难

translation.en: but I thought he would be better off without me.
translation.zh: 但我以为没有我他会生活得更好

translation.en: And I was wrong, I see that now, but…
translation.zh: 我知道我错了 我现在才明白 但…

translation.en: Stop being so stoic, Stoick!
translation.zh: 别再强忍着了 斯多戈

translation.en: Go on. Shout, scream, say something!
translation.zh: 来吧 叫出来 喊出来 说什么都行

translation.en: You're as beautiful as the day I lost you.
translation.zh: 你还和当初离开我时一样漂亮

translation.en: [Snotlout] Could this day get any worse? [Tuffnut] Let me see.
translation.zh: -今天还会更糟吗？ -我想想

translation.en: We're gonna jump into freezing cold water, then die from drowning.
translation.zh: 我们将跳到冰冷的水里 然后溺水而死

translation.en: [Eret] Looks refreshing. Please, ladies first.
translation.zh: 感觉还不错 请吧 女士优先

translation.en: You are a steaming heap of dragon…
translation.zh: -你真是一坨热气腾腾的龙… -闪开

translation.en: Warn the others! Get them, you son of an Eret.
translation.zh: -通知其他人 -干掉他们 埃雷特家族的长子

translation.en: [Tuffnut] Take that!
translation.zh: 尝尝这个

translation.en: Okay, I love you again.
translation.zh: 好吧 我又爱上你了

translation.en: -[exhales] -Pathetic. You can still jump.
translation.zh: 没希望了 你就接着跳吧

translation.en: So, are we going to save your dragons and get out of here, or not?
translation.zh: 先把你的龙救出来 然后离开这里 对吗？

translation.en: [Eret] Check every trap. They're here somewhere.
translation.zh: 检查每个捕捉器 他们一定在这儿

translation.en: Meatlug?
translation.zh: 肉耳朵？

translation.en: [straining] Anyone coming?
translation.zh: 有没有人来？

translation.en: I don't know. You just keep doing what you are doing.
translation.zh: 不知道 你只管继续干就是了

translation.en: Keep cranking.
translation.zh: 使劲摇啊

translation.en: Thank you for saving my life.
translation.zh: 谢谢你救了我的命

translation.en: Now let me return the favor.
translation.zh: 现在让我来报答你吧

translation.en: Mom, you'd never even recognize it.
translation.zh: 妈妈 你可能都认不出来那儿了

translation.en: Where we used to make weapons, we now build saddles, wing-slings.
translation.zh: 以前我们制造武器的地方 现在改成做龙鞍子 龙翼绷带

translation.en: We even fix dragon teeth!
translation.zh: 我们甚至还给龙修牙

translation.en: You wouldn't believe how much everything's changed.
translation.zh: 你绝对想象不到那里的变化有多大

translation.en: Your son has changed Berk for the better.
translation.zh: 是啊 我们的儿子让博克岛变得更好

translation.en: I think we did well with this one, Val.
translation.zh: 我认为这是我们俩最好的作品

translation.en: -Thanks, Dad. -Oh!
translation.zh: 谢谢 老爸

translation.en: [Stoick chuckles] Oh, I got it. I got it.
translation.zh: 我来吧

translation.en: I'm a little out of practice.
translation.zh: 我的厨艺不太好

translation.en: Well, you know…
translation.zh: 你知道 我可不是娶你来做饭的

translation.en: -I didn't marry you for your cooking. -[Gobber] I hope not.
translation.zh: 你知道 我可不是娶你来做饭的 但愿不是

translation.en: Her meatballs could kill more beasts than a battle-axe.
translation.zh: 她做的肉丸子杀伤力简直比战斧还大

translation.en: I've still got a few knocking around in here. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我的胃现在还有后遗症

translation.en: And once you move back in, with all your dragons…
translation.zh: 如果你和你的龙一起搬回那里去

translation.en: Drago won't even stand a chance.
translation.zh: 德雷格是一点机会都没有了

translation.en: Everything will be okay!
translation.zh: 一切都会好起来的

translation.en: Slow down, son. It's a lot to take in.
translation.zh: 先等等 儿子 别给她太多压力

translation.en: [Hiccup] Oh, gotcha.
translation.zh: 明白

translation.en: Oh, I love this one.
translation.zh: 我喜欢这首歌

translation.en: Remember our song, Val?
translation.zh: 还记得这首歌吗 沃尔卡？

translation.en: ♪ I'll swim and sail on savage seas ♪
translation.zh: 我要在惊涛骇浪中游泳扬帆

translation.en: ♪ With ne'er a fear of drowning ♪
translation.zh: 不畏惧死亡的呼唤

translation.en: ♪ And gladly ride the waves of life ♪
translation.zh: 也想快乐地站在生活的浪尖

translation.en: ♪ If you will marry me ♪
translation.zh: 只要你肯跟我作伴

translation.en: ♪ No scorching sun ♪
translation.zh: 不管烈日炎炎

translation.en: ♪ Nor freezing cold will stop… ♪
translation.zh: 还是凛冽严寒 -都不能… -不能阻止我的征程

translation.en: ♪ Will stop me on my journey ♪
translation.zh: -都不能… -不能阻止我的征程

translation.en: Sorry. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: ♪ If you will promise me your heart ♪
translation.zh: 如果你把你的心交给我

translation.en: ♪ And love… ♪
translation.zh: 爱我…

translation.en: ♪ And love me for eternity ♪
translation.zh: 爱我一直到永远

translation.en: ♪ My dearest one ♪ ♪ My darling dear ♪
translation.zh: 我的最爱 最爱的人

translation.en: ♪ Your mighty words astound me ♪
translation.zh: 你的话语震荡在我心间

translation.en: ♪ But I've no need of mighty deeds ♪
translation.zh: 当你把我拥在怀里

translation.en: ♪ When I feel your arms around me ♪
translation.zh: 我已经不需要更多的誓言

translation.en: ♪ But I would bring you rings of gold ♪
translation.zh: 戴上我的金指环

translation.en: ♪ I'd even sing you poetry ♪ Whoo! Oh, would you?
translation.zh: 听我给你唱首歌

translation.en: ♪ And I would keep you from all harm ♪
translation.zh: 我要让你远离所有的伤害

translation.en: ♪ If you would stay beside me ♪
translation.zh: 只要你永远在我身边

translation.en: ♪ I have no use for rings of gold ♪
translation.zh: 我不需要什么黄金指环

translation.en: ♪ I care not for your poetry ♪
translation.zh: 也不想听你唱的有多甜

translation.en: ♪ I only want your hand to hold ♪
translation.zh: 我只想和你手相牵

translation.en: ♪ I only want you near me ♪
translation.zh: 只想你在我身边

translation.en: [Stoick and Valka] ♪ To love and kiss, to sweetly hold ♪
translation.zh: 只想你在我身边 相爱相吻 紧相拥 翩翩起舞梦想无限

translation.en: ♪ For the dancing and the dreaming ♪
translation.zh: 相爱相吻 紧相拥 翩翩起舞梦想无限

translation.en: ♪ Through all life's sorrows and delights ♪ ♪ I'll keep your love inside me ♪
translation.zh: -经过人生的苦乐 只留你的爱在心间 -来 小嗝嗝

translation.en: ♪ I will swim and sail on savage seas ♪
translation.zh: 在惊涛骇浪中游泳扬帆

translation.en: ♪ With ne'er a fear of drowning ♪
translation.zh: 不畏惧死亡的呼唤

translation.en: ♪ And gladly ride the waves of life ♪
translation.zh: 快乐地站在生活的浪尖

translation.en: ♪ If you will marry me ♪ -[both laughing] -[Gobber vocalizing]
translation.zh: 只要你跟我作伴

translation.en: ♪ I'm still going ♪
translation.zh: 我还没唱完

translation.en: -Gobber! -I'm done.
translation.zh: -高博 -唱完了

translation.en: I thought I would have to die before we could have that dance again.
translation.zh: 我以为我们这辈子 再也没机会一起跳舞了

translation.en: No need for drastic measures.
translation.zh: 没必要搞这么大排场

translation.en: For you, my dear…
translation.zh: 为了你 亲爱的

translation.en: Anything.
translation.zh: 什么都行

translation.en: Will you come home, Val?
translation.zh: 愿意跟我回家吗？

translation.en: Will you be my wife once again?
translation.zh: 还愿意再做我妻子吗？

translation.en: We can be a family! What do you say?
translation.zh: 我们一起生活 你觉得呢？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 那好吧

translation.en: Great! I'll do the cooking.
translation.zh: 太棒了 我负责做饭

translation.en: Thank Odin you didn't listen to me, son.
translation.zh: 感谢奥丁 幸好你没听我的

translation.en: We never would have found each other.
translation.zh: 不然这辈子都不能再相见了

translation.en: Toothless?
translation.zh: 没牙仔

translation.en: What's happening?
translation.zh: 出什么事了？

translation.en: Oh, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Val?
translation.zh: 沃尔卡

translation.en: Val! It's all right, it's all right.
translation.zh: 沃尔卡 没事了 我们又在一起了

translation.en: We're a team now. What do you want to do?
translation.zh: 没事了 我们又在一起了 你现在想怎么做？

translation.en: We have to save the dragons.
translation.zh: 我们必须把龙救出来

translation.en: Aye. You got it! Come on, son.
translation.zh: 好 没问题 走吧 儿子

translation.en: Whatever comes, keep hitting the mountain.
translation.zh: 不惜一切代价 全力攻击那座山

translation.en: We need to draw the alpha out.
translation.zh: 一定要把阿尔法引出来

translation.en: Ready the traps!
translation.zh: 捕捉器准备

translation.en: [Tuffnut] Surprise! Yeah! [snickering]
translation.zh: 惊喜吧 棒极了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: You really are full of surprises! [grunts] Let's go!
translation.zh: 你还真是时刻充满惊喜 我们走

translation.en: [Tuffnut] Dragon riders, coming through!
translation.zh: 驯龙骑士大驾光临了

translation.en: Fire!
translation.zh: 开火

translation.en: Cut them down!
translation.zh: 把他们都干掉

translation.en: [Astrid] Up, girl!
translation.zh: 向上 好孩子 向左 埃雷特

translation.en: Lean left, Eret! That's it!
translation.zh: 向上 好孩子 向左 埃雷特 就这样 小心

translation.en: -[Eret shouts] -[Astrid] Look out!
translation.zh: 就这样 小心

translation.en: [Hiccup] Yeah, baby!
translation.zh: 宝贝

translation.en: Take them down!
translation.zh: 把他们打下来

translation.en: Heads up!
translation.zh: 都往这儿看

translation.en: Dragon master.
translation.zh: 是驯龙高手

translation.en: Welcome aboard, dragon rider!
translation.zh: 欢迎加入我们 驯龙骑士

translation.en: Thanks, I think.
translation.zh: 我该说 谢谢

translation.en: Where have you been?
translation.zh: 你这是去哪了？

translation.en: Oh, you know, catching up with Mom.
translation.zh: 还能去哪 跟老妈叙旧了

translation.en: That's your mother?
translation.zh: 那就是你妈妈？

translation.en: Now you know where I get my dramatic flair.
translation.zh: 是啊 现在知道我的天分从哪来的了吧

translation.en: The alpha! Now we have a fight!
translation.zh: 是阿尔法 看来是一场硬仗

translation.en: [Hiccup] Come on, Toothless!
translation.zh: 来吧 没牙仔

translation.en: Show them what you got, bud.
translation.zh: 让他们看看你的本事 伙计

translation.en: Atta boy!
translation.zh: 好孩子

translation.en: I've waited a long time for this!
translation.zh: 这一刻我等得太久了

translation.en: You cannot take our dragons!
translation.zh: 你带不走我们的龙

translation.en: They are controlled by the alpha!
translation.zh: 他们只会听阿尔法的

translation.en: Then it's a good thing I brought a challenger.
translation.zh: 幸运的是 我带了一个挑战者

translation.en: Another one?
translation.zh: 还有一个？

translation.en: [Fishlegs] That is a class ten! Class ten!
translation.zh: 那个是十级的 十级的

translation.en: [Valka] No. [Drago] Come on! Take down the alpha!
translation.zh: -不 -来吧 干掉阿尔法

translation.en: -[Valka] No! -[both grunting]
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: For you, my dear… Anything. [grunts]
translation.zh: 为了你 亲爱的 什么都行

translation.en: Val, do you think you can stop them?
translation.zh: 沃尔卡 你能阻止他们吗？

translation.en: I'll do my best. Come on, Cloudjumper!
translation.zh: 我会努力的 来吧 云中跃

translation.en: You! I watched you burn!
translation.zh: 是你 你不是被烧死了吗？

translation.en: It takes more than a little fire to kill me!
translation.zh: 想烧死我 你的火还不够猛

translation.en: Stoick!
translation.zh: 斯多戈

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不要

translation.en: We have won.
translation.zh: 我们赢了 现在

translation.en: Now, finish her!
translation.zh: 我们赢了 现在 -杀掉她 -不

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: -杀掉她 -不

translation.en: [Stoick] Hold on! Skullcrusher, go!
translation.zh: 坚持住 快 颅碎龙

translation.en: Come on, Gobber! Right behind you, Stoick!
translation.zh: -快点 高博 -我这就来 斯多戈

translation.en: [Hiccup] Stop!
translation.zh: 住手

translation.en: Stop!
translation.zh: 住手

translation.en: This is the great dragon master?
translation.zh: 这就是伟大的驯龙高手？

translation.en: The son of Stoick the Vast?
translation.zh: 斯多戈和沃尔卡的儿子

translation.en: What shame he must feel.
translation.zh: 你可真给他丢脸

translation.en: All of this loss, and for what?
translation.zh: 牺牲了那么多 是为了什么？

translation.en: To become unstoppable?
translation.zh: 成为世界上最强的人吗？

translation.en: To rule the world?
translation.zh: 想统治世界吗？

translation.en: Dragons are kind, amazing creatures
translation.zh: 那些龙 它们是善良、神奇的生物

translation.en: that can bring people together.
translation.zh: 它们能让大家团结起来

translation.en: Or tear them apart.
translation.zh: 或者是妻离子散

translation.en: You see… I know what it is to live in fear.
translation.zh: 我知道生活在恐惧中是什么样的

translation.en: To see my village burned,
translation.zh: 亲眼看着村庄被烧毁

translation.en: my family taken.
translation.zh: 看着家人被杀光

translation.en: But even as a boy,
translation.zh: 当时我还是个孩子

translation.en: left with nothing,
translation.zh: 身上一无所有

translation.en: I vowed to rise above the fear of dragons
translation.zh: 但我发誓 要战胜对龙的恐惧

translation.en: and liberate the people of this world.
translation.zh: 拯救这个世界上的人们

translation.en: Then why a dragon army?
translation.zh: 那为什么组建龙族军队？

translation.en: Well, you need dragons to conquer other dragons.
translation.zh: 因为只有龙才能征服自己的同类

translation.en: Or maybe you need dragons to conquer people.
translation.zh: 你只是想用龙来征服其他的人类

translation.en: To control those who follow you,
translation.zh: 用它们来控制跟随你的人

translation.en: and to get rid of those who won't.
translation.zh: 除掉不肯与你为伍的人

translation.en: Clever boy.
translation.zh: 你还挺聪明

translation.en: The world wants peace.
translation.zh: 这世界需要和平

translation.en: And we have the answer back on Berk.
translation.zh: 在我们博克岛上 就是这样

translation.en: Just let me show you.
translation.zh: -我可以带你去看看 -不

translation.en: Let me show you!
translation.zh: 我想让你来看看

translation.en: What in…
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: Hiccup!
translation.zh: 小嗝嗝

translation.en: -[panting] -[Stoick] Come on, Gobber!
translation.zh: 跟我来 高博

translation.en: Okay, change of plan!
translation.zh: 好吧 计划有变

translation.en: No dragon can resist the alpha's command.
translation.zh: 所有的龙都要受阿尔法的控制

translation.en: So, he who controls the alpha
translation.zh: 所以 如果能控制了阿尔法

translation.en: controls them all.
translation.zh: 就控制了全部

translation.en: Toothless?
translation.zh: 没牙仔？

translation.en: Toothless, you okay, bud? What's going on?
translation.zh: 没牙仔 你没事吧？ -到底怎么了？ -展示真正的力量

translation.en: [Drago] Witness true strength.
translation.zh: -到底怎么了？ -展示真正的力量

translation.en: The strength of will over others.
translation.zh: 用意念控制你的同类

translation.en: In the face of it, you are nothing.
translation.zh: 站在它的面前 你什么都不是

translation.en: What did he just tell you?
translation.zh: 它刚才跟你说了些什么？

translation.en: Toothless, come on. What's the matter with you?
translation.zh: 没牙仔 别这样 你到底是怎么了？

translation.en: No, no, no, no. Come on. What are you doing? Knock it off.
translation.zh: 不 别闹了 你在干什么？快醒醒

translation.en: Stop! Snap out of it!
translation.zh: 停下 我让你快醒过来

translation.en: Toothless, no! Toothless!
translation.zh: 没牙仔 不 没牙仔

translation.en: -[Hiccup] Don't! -Hiccup!
translation.zh: -不要 -小嗝嗝

translation.en: Stop!
translation.zh: -别过来 -儿子

translation.en: -Son! -Dad!
translation.zh: -别过来 -儿子 爸爸 不要

translation.en: -No! -[grunts]
translation.zh: 爸爸 不要

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Dad!
translation.zh: 爸爸

translation.en: Stoick!
translation.zh: 斯多戈

translation.en: Dad. No, you…
translation.zh: 爸爸 不 你…

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: [Hiccup] No, no, no.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: No! Get away from him!
translation.zh: 不 你离他远点

translation.en: Go on! Get out of here! -[whimpers] -[Hiccup] Get away!
translation.zh: 走啊 离开这里 走开

translation.en: It's not his fault. You know that.
translation.zh: 这不能怪它 你知道的

translation.en: [Valka] Good dragons under the control of bad people…
translation.zh: 善良的龙 若是受坏人的控制

translation.en: Wait! Don't go.
translation.zh: 等等 别走

translation.en: [Valka] …do bad things.
translation.zh: 也会做坏事

translation.en: [Drago] Come on!
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Gather the men and meet me at Berk!
translation.zh: 全体集合 目标博克岛

translation.en: Toothless! No, don't.
translation.zh: -没牙仔 -你冷静点

translation.en: [Gobber] May the Valkyries welcome you
translation.zh: 愿侍女瓦尔基里欢迎你

translation.en: and lead you through Odin's great battlefield.
translation.zh: 带你走过奥丁王的伟大战场

translation.en: May they sing your name with love and fury
translation.zh: 愿他们用爱和愤怒唱颂你的名字

translation.en: so that we might hear it rise from the depths of Valhalla
translation.zh: 让我们听见瓦尔哈拉殿堂传来的颂歌

translation.en: and know that you have taken your rightful place
translation.zh: 知道你已经到达了那里

translation.en: at the table of kings.
translation.zh: 获得了应有的席位

translation.en: For a great man has fallen.
translation.zh: 一位伟人从此陨落

translation.en: A warrior. A chieftain.
translation.zh: 他是勇士 是酋长

translation.en: A father. A friend.
translation.zh: 也是父亲和挚友

translation.en: I'm sorry, Dad.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 爸爸

translation.en: I'm not the chief that you wanted me to be.
translation.zh: 我不是您心目中称职的头领

translation.en: And I'm not the peacekeeper I thought I was.
translation.zh: 我不是曾经自诩的和平卫士

translation.en: I don't know…
translation.zh: 我不知道

translation.en: You came early into this world.
translation.zh: 你出生的时候是早产

translation.en: You were such a wee thing.
translation.zh: 我还记得你那小模样

translation.en: So frail, so fragile.
translation.zh: 那么弱小 那么脆弱

translation.en: I feared you wouldn't make it.
translation.zh: 我还担心你活不下来

translation.en: But your father… He never doubted.
translation.zh: 可是你父亲 他从没怀疑过

translation.en: He always said you would become the strongest of them all.
translation.zh: 他总是说你会变成他们中最强的那个

translation.en: And he was right.
translation.zh: 他说得没错

translation.en: You have the heart of a chief and the soul of a dragon.
translation.zh: 你有领袖的胸怀和龙族的精神

translation.en: Only you can bring our worlds together.
translation.zh: 只有你才能把两个世界团结起来

translation.en: That is who you are, son.
translation.zh: 这就是你的使命 儿子

translation.en: I, uh… I was so afraid of becoming my dad.
translation.zh: 我一直害怕成为爸爸那样

translation.en: Mostly because I thought I never could.
translation.zh: 是因为我觉得自己永远也做不到

translation.en: How do you become someone that great?
translation.zh: 怎么可能成为那么伟大

translation.en: That brave? That selfless?
translation.zh: 那么勇敢无私的人呢？

translation.en: I guess you can only try.
translation.zh: 我想只能尽最大努力

translation.en: A chief protects his own.
translation.zh: 头领得保护自己的民众

translation.en: We are going back.
translation.zh: 我们必须回去

translation.en: Uh, with what? He took all the dragons.
translation.zh: -怎么回去？ -他把龙全都抓走了

translation.en: Not all of them.
translation.zh: 没全抓走

translation.en: [Fishlegs] I don't want to die!
translation.zh: 我可不想死

translation.en: We can't fly these things! [Fishlegs] Yeah, no kidding!
translation.zh: -这帮家伙能行吗？ -太不靠谱了

translation.en: But won't that Bewilderbeast just
translation.zh: 刚才那个催眠大师

translation.en: take control of these guys, too?
translation.zh: 怎么没把它们也控制了呢？

translation.en: They're babies. They don't listen to anyone.
translation.zh: 它们还是孩子 谁的话也不会听

translation.en: Yeah! Just like us!
translation.zh: 对 跟我们一样

translation.en: This is very dangerous!
translation.zh: 这的确太危险了

translation.en: Some might suggest this is poorly conceived.
translation.zh: 应该有人指出这计划欠考虑

translation.en: It's a good thing that I never listen.
translation.zh: 幸好我从来不听劝

translation.en: So what is your… plan?
translation.zh: 那么 下一步计划呢？

translation.en: Get Toothless back and kick Drago's…
translation.zh: 把没牙仔找回来 打败德雷格

translation.en: Heads up!
translation.zh: 小心

translation.en: And that thing.
translation.zh: 还有那东西

translation.en: [exclaiming happily] That's a good boy.
translation.zh: 真是好孩子

translation.en: [stammers] Watch the furniture!
translation.zh: 什么 小心点家具

translation.en: Where are you going? [gasps]
translation.zh: 你要去哪？

translation.en: Your chief is dead.
translation.zh: 你们的酋长已经死了

translation.en: Stoick?
translation.zh: -斯多戈？ -这不可能

translation.en: No one can protect you now.
translation.zh: 现在没人来保护你们了

translation.en: [Hiccup] No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: He took all the dragons!
translation.zh: 他把龙都带走了

translation.en: Distract the alpha. Try to keep his focus off Toothless.
translation.zh: 想办法吸引阿尔法 分散它对没牙仔的注意力

translation.en: Uh… How?
translation.zh: 怎么做？

translation.en: Have you forgotten who you're riding with?
translation.zh: 你们忘了我是干什么的了？

translation.en: There isn't a dragon alive that I can't wrangle!
translation.zh: 敢不听我话的龙早就死绝了

translation.en: Except for this one! Amateur.
translation.zh: -这只龙除外 -真能吹

translation.en: Hey, look. It's Hiccup!
translation.zh: 看啊 是小嗝嗝

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: [Ruffnut grunts] Keep them coming! Black sheep, baby!
translation.zh: -继续发射 -头羊来了 宝贝

translation.en: [Snotlout] Ten points!
translation.zh: 正中靶心

translation.en: Uh-oh.
translation.zh: 糟糕

translation.en: [Fishlegs] I'm okay!
translation.zh: 我没事

translation.en: You certainly are hard to get rid of, I'll say that.
translation.zh: 想摆脱你真不容易 我现在明白了

translation.en: Toothless?
translation.zh: 没牙仔

translation.en: Hey, it's me, bud.
translation.zh: 嘿 是我 伙计

translation.en: It's me. It's me. I'm right here, bud.
translation.zh: 是我 我在这里 伙计

translation.en: Come back to me.
translation.zh: 快醒过来

translation.en: He's not yours anymore.
translation.zh: 它已经不再是你的了

translation.en: He belongs to the alpha.
translation.zh: 它现在属于阿尔法

translation.en: But, please, great dragon master,
translation.zh: 不过 请伟大的驯龙高手

translation.en: try to take him.
translation.zh: 试着去驾驭它

translation.en: He will not miss a second time.
translation.zh: 我保证 这回它不会再失手了

translation.en: It wasn't your fault, bud.
translation.zh: 那不是你的错 伙计

translation.en: They made you do it.
translation.zh: 是他们控制你干的

translation.en: You would never hurt him.
translation.zh: 你没想要伤害他

translation.en: [distorted] You would never hurt me.
translation.zh: 也永远不会伤害我

translation.en: How are you doing that?
translation.zh: 你是怎么做到的？

translation.en: Please. You are my best friend, bud.
translation.zh: 求你了 你是我最好的朋友 伙计

translation.en: My best friend.
translation.zh: 我最好的朋友

translation.en: Atta boy! That's it! I'm here!
translation.zh: 好孩子 这就对了 我在这里

translation.en: [Drago] Enough!
translation.zh: 够了

translation.en: Hang on!
translation.zh: 坚持住

translation.en: Almost there, buddy.
translation.zh: 就要成功了 伙计 就要成功了

translation.en: [Drago] Do something!
translation.zh: 快动手

translation.en: We need to get those two apart.
translation.zh: 得把那两个家伙分开

translation.en: We gotta block him out, Toothless.
translation.zh: 我们必须屏蔽掉控制 没牙仔

translation.en: Do you trust me, bud?
translation.zh: 你相信我吗 伙计？

translation.en: We can do this.
translation.zh: 我们能做到

translation.en: You and me. As one.
translation.zh: 你和我一条心

translation.en: That's it. Now let's try this one more time!
translation.zh: 就这样 现在我们就再来试一次

translation.en: Take him down, babe!
translation.zh: 干掉它 亲爱的

translation.en: Go get 'em!
translation.zh: 去打败他们

translation.en: Take control of it!
translation.zh: 快点控制它

translation.en: Shut it out, Toothless.
translation.zh: 别理它 没牙仔

translation.en: -Stop them! -Now!
translation.zh: -挡住他们 -行动

translation.en: Not again.
translation.zh: 又来

translation.en: Toothless! It's now or never!
translation.zh: 没牙仔 成败在此一举了

translation.en: Come on, bud! [grunts]
translation.zh: 加油 伙计

translation.en: Hold on!
translation.zh: 坚持住

translation.en: Yeah! We did it!
translation.zh: 我们成功了

translation.en: [Hiccup] Hold him there, Toothless.
translation.zh: 别让他跑了 没牙仔

translation.en: It's all over now.
translation.zh: 一切都该结束了

translation.en: Or is it?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Oh, no!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Hiccup!
translation.zh: 小嗝嗝

translation.en: He's challenging the alpha! To protect you.
translation.zh: -它在挑战阿尔法 -它在保护你

translation.en: No, no, no! No!
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: Fight back! Fight! Fight!
translation.zh: 反击 进攻

translation.en: What's the matter with you?
translation.zh: 你到底是怎么回事？

translation.en: Now do you get it?
translation.zh: 现在你明白了吧？

translation.en: This is what it is to earn a dragon's loyalty.
translation.zh: 只有这样才能获得龙对你的忠心

translation.en: Let this end. Now.
translation.zh: 到此为止吧

translation.en: Never! Come on!
translation.zh: 休想 干掉他

translation.en: Fight!
translation.zh: 给我打

translation.en: The alpha protects them all.
translation.zh: 作为头领 就得保护手下

translation.en: You never cease to amaze me, bud.
translation.zh: 你总是让我惊喜不断 伙计

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢你

translation.en: Toothless, you know that doesn't wash out!
translation.zh: 没牙仔 别弄脏我衣服 洗不掉的

translation.en: [man] I knew you'd come back!
translation.zh: 我知道你会回来的 快来抱抱 宝贝

translation.en: [Astrid] Stormfly!
translation.zh: 风里飞

translation.en: Oh, give me a cuddle, Grumpy!
translation.zh: 快点来个拥抱 格拉姆

translation.en: Who's my little princess?
translation.zh: 这不是我的小公主吗？

translation.en: Don't you ever leave again, Hookfang.
translation.zh: 再也不要离开我了 亲爱的 是你 真的是你 想死你了

translation.en: You are! Yes, you are! I missed you!
translation.zh: 是你 真的是你 想死你了

translation.en: Oh, Barf! Not you!
translation.zh: 巴夫 没叫你

translation.en: That was some pretty fine dragon wrangling back there.
translation.zh: 这些可爱的龙聚在一起真有意思

translation.en: You'd make a good trapper.
translation.zh: 你是个不错的猎手

translation.en: You know, Skullcrusher's gonna need somebody
translation.zh: 你知道 颅碎龙 现在非常需要有个人来照顾它

translation.en: to look after him now.
translation.zh: 现在非常需要有个人来照顾它

translation.en: Me?
translation.zh: 我？

translation.en: I'd be honored.
translation.zh: 你就放心吧

translation.en: Your father would be every bit as proud as I am.
translation.zh: 你爸爸和我一样 都为你感到骄傲

translation.en: [chuckles] Thank you. I'm really glad you're here, Mom.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 真高兴你能来 妈妈

translation.en: And here I'll stay.
translation.zh: 来了就不走了

translation.en: See? I told you it was in here.
translation.zh: 看到没？我说了它就在这儿

translation.en: Still doing that one? That's hilarious.
translation.zh: 就知道你会来这套 真好笑

translation.en: Come here, you.
translation.zh: 轮到我了

translation.en: The chief has come home!
translation.zh: 我们的酋长回来了

translation.en: [all chanting] Long live the chief!
translation.zh: 酋长万岁

translation.en: Long live the chief! Long live the chief!
translation.zh: 酋长万岁 酋长万岁

translation.en: [Hiccup] This is Berk.
translation.zh: 这就是博克岛

translation.en: A bit trampled and busted and covered in ice,
translation.zh: 受人欺凌 满目疮痍 冰天雪地

translation.en: but it's home. It's our home.
translation.zh: 但它是家 是我们的家

translation.en: [Hiccup] Those who attacked us are relentless and crazy.
translation.zh: 袭击我们的那些人 残忍血腥 丧心病狂 但我们打败了他们

translation.en: But those who stopped them,
translation.zh: 丧心病狂 但我们打败了他们

translation.en: oh, even more so!
translation.zh: 比他们还狠

translation.en: [Hiccup] We may be small in numbers,
translation.zh: 我们在数量上很少

translation.en: but we stand for something
translation.zh: 但是 我们代表的群体

translation.en: bigger than anything the world can pit against us.
translation.zh: 却比任何对抗我们的势力都要强大

translation.en: We are the voice of peace.
translation.zh: 我们是和平的代言人

translation.en: And, bit by bit, we will change this world.
translation.zh: 我们将逐步改变这个世界

translation.en: [Hiccup] You see, we have something they don't.
translation.zh: 我们拥有他们所没有的东西

translation.en: Oh, sure, they have armies, and they have armadas,
translation.zh: 当然 他们有军队 而且还有舰队

translation.en: but we… We have…
translation.zh: 但是我们有

translation.en: Our dragons!
translation.zh: 我们的龙
